title: Where does Akali's ult place her?
body: When Akali ults does she end up behind you like Zed?

replies.body: I'm pretty sure its behind the direction she ulted from, so if you're standing looking up towards baron in river and she ults you from the right side, i believe she'll end up on the left side.
She'll be on the side she ulted from if from a distance, the opposite if it was from close up.
You can test this out with the practice tool
